Uses of Interface
org.restlet.data.Metadata

Packages that use Metadata
com.noelios.restlet Top-level classes, interfaces and exceptions. 
com.noelios.restlet.data Elements of information handled by a component via a connector. 
com.noelios.restlet.ext.freemarker Extension package providing integration with FreeMarker. 
org.restlet.data Elements of information handled by a component via a connector. 
 

Uses of Metadata in com.noelios.restlet
 

Methods in com.noelios.restlet that return Metadata
 Metadata DirectoryRestlet.getMetadata(String extension)
          Returns the metadata mapped to an extension.
 

Methods in com.noelios.restlet with parameters of type Metadata
 void DirectoryRestlet.addExtension(String extension, Metadata metadata)
          Maps an extension to some metadata (media type, language or character set) to an extension.
